about_the_game:
Step into the whimsical world of Bakery Shop Match Up! Your task is to find and match items that belong together in this charming bakery-themed puzzle game. As you progress, the puzzles become more challenging, testing your puzzle-solving skills to the limit. But it’s more than just a game; it’s an opportunity to set new personal records and achieve the highest scores. Can you master the match-ups and become the ultimate bakery champion? Dive in and start matching!

Features:

- Charming Bakery Theme: Immerse yourself in a delightful bakery setting filled with adorable treats and cozy décor.
- Progressive Puzzles: Dive into a series of puzzles that evolve in complexity, offering a fresh challenge at every turn, keeping your puzzle-solving skills sharp and engaged.
- Record-Breaking Fun: Track your progress and aim to break your own records, achieving higher scores with each round.
- Easy Controls: Enjoy simple and intuitive controls that make playing a breeze for everyone.
- Relaxing Music: Unwind with soothing background music as you play.

name: Bakery Shop Match Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
